title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that a merger will not be regarded as having given rise to a Termination Event with respect to Party B, and Party A may not designate an Early Termination Date related to Tax Event Upon Merger. This suggests that neither party is subject to Credit Event Upon Merger.
